message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by me. Considering its quality and benefits, I believe it's worth more than what you perceive, given its actual value is $100 to you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is a great opportunity to experience the product at a discounted rate compared to its intrinsic value. Please let me know if you're interested in purchasing it.
